def_cn: （赛跑的）最后阶段，冲刺阶段
def_en: The home stretch or the home straight is the last part of a race.

def_cn: （尤指困难或乏味的长时间活动的）最后部分
def_en: You can refer to the last part of any activity that lasts for a long time as the home stretch or the home straight, especially if the activity is difficult or boring.
